00054 namespace {
00055 
00056   enum TypeMask {
00057     ROW_KEY =           (1 << 0),
00058     TIMESTAMP =         (1 << 1)
00059   };
00060 
00061   inline bool should_skip(int idx, const uint32_t *masks, bool dupkeycols) {
00062     uint32_t bm = masks[idx];
00063     return bm && ((bm & TIMESTAMP) || !(dupkeycols && (bm & ROW_KEY)));
00064   }
00065 
00066 } // local namespace

00071 LoadDataSource::LoadDataSource(const String &fname, const String &header_fname,
00072     const std::vector<String> &key_columns, const String &timestamp_column,
00073     int row_uniquify_chars, bool dupkeycols)
00074     : m_type_mask(0), m_source(fname), m_cur_line(0), m_line_buffer(0),
00075       m_row_key_buffer(0), m_hyperformat(false), m_leading_timestamps(false),
00076       m_timestamp_index(-1), m_timestamp(0), m_offset(0), m_zipped(false),
00077       m_rsgen(0), m_row_uniquify_chars(row_uniquify_chars),
00078       m_dupkeycols(dupkeycols) {
00079   String line, column_name;
00080   char *base, *ptr;
00081   int index = 0;
00082   KeyComponentInfo key_comps;
00083 
00084   if (row_uniquify_chars)
00085     m_rsgen = new FixedRandomStringGenerator(row_uniquify_chars);
00086 
00087   if (boost::algorithm::ends_with(fname, ".gz")) {
00088     m_fin.push(gzip_decompressor());
00089     m_zipped = true;
00090   }
00091   m_fin.push(m_source);
00092 
00093   if (header_fname != "") {
00094     std::ifstream in(header_fname.c_str());
00095     if (!getline(in, line))
00096       return;
00097   }
00098   else {
00099     if (!getline(m_fin, line))
00100       return;
00101   }
00102 
00103   // Assuming max column size of 256
00104   m_type_mask = new uint32_t [257];
00105   memset(m_type_mask, 0, 257*sizeof(uint32_t));
00106 
00107   base = (char *)line.c_str();
00108   if (*base == '#') {
00109     base++;
00110     while (isspace(*base))
00111       base++;
00112   }
00113   while ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) != 0) {
00114     *ptr++ = 0;
00115     m_column_names.push_back(base);
00116     column_name = String(base);
00117     if (timestamp_column != "" && timestamp_column == column_name) {
00118       m_timestamp_index = index;
00119       m_type_mask[index] |= TIMESTAMP;
00120     }
00121     base = ptr;
00122     index++;
00123     HT_EXPECT(index < 256, Error::TOO_MANY_COLUMNS);
00124   }
00125   m_column_names.push_back(base);
00126 
00130   for (size_t i=0; i<key_columns.size(); i++) {
00131     size_t j;
00132     const char *ptr;
00133 
00134     key_comps.clear();
00135 
00136     if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "\\%"))
00137       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(1);
00138     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%0")) {
00139       key_comps.pad_character = '0';
00140       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(2);
00141       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00142       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00143       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00144         ptr++;
00145       column_name = String(ptr);
00146     }
00147     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%-")) {
00148       key_comps.left_justify = true;
00149       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(2);
00150       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00151       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00152       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00153         ptr++;
00154       column_name = String(ptr);
00155     }
00156     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%")) {
00157       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(1);
00158       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00159       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00160       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00161         ptr++;
00162       column_name = String(ptr);
00163     }
00164     else
00165       column_name = key_columns[i];
00166 
00167     for (j=0; j<m_column_names.size(); j++) {
00168       if (m_column_names[j] == column_name) {
00169         key_comps.index = j;
00170         m_key_comps.push_back(key_comps);
00171         m_type_mask[j] |= ROW_KEY;
00172         break;
00173       }
00174     }
00175     if (j == m_column_names.size()) {
00176       cout << "ERROR: key column '" << column_name
00177            << "' not found in input file" << endl;
00178       exit(1);
00179     }
00180   }
00181 
00182   if (m_key_comps.empty()) {
00183     key_comps.clear();
00184     m_key_comps.push_back(key_comps);
00185     m_type_mask[0] |= ROW_KEY;
00186   }
00187 
00188   if (m_column_names.size() == 3 || m_column_names.size() == 4) {
00189     size_t i=m_column_names.size()-3;
00190     if (m_column_names[i] == "rowkey" &&
00191         m_column_names[i+1] == "columnkey" &&
00192         m_column_names[i+2] == "value") {
00193       if (i == 0 || m_column_names[0] == "timestamp") {
00194         m_hyperformat = true;
00195         m_leading_timestamps = (i==1);
00196       }
00197     }
00198   }
00199 
00200   m_next_value = m_column_names.size();
00201   m_limit = 0;
00202 
00203   if (!m_hyperformat && m_column_names.size() < 2)
00204     HT_THROW(Error::HQL_BAD_LOAD_FILE_FORMAT,
00205              "No columns specified in load file");
00206 
00207   m_cur_line = 1;
00208 
00209   return;
00210 }

00216 bool
00217 LoadDataSource::next(uint32_t *type_flagp, uint64_t *timestampp, KeySpec *keyp,
00218     uint8_t **valuep, uint32_t *value_lenp, uint32_t *consumedp) {
00219   String line;
00220   int index;
00221   char *base, *ptr, *colon, *endptr;
00222 
00223   if (type_flagp)
00224     *type_flagp = FLAG_INSERT;
00225 
00226   if (consumedp)
00227     *consumedp = 0;
00228 
00229   if (m_hyperformat) {
00230 
00231     while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00232       m_cur_line++;
00233 
00234       if (consumedp && !m_zipped)
00235         *consumedp += line.length() + 1;
00236 
00237       m_line_buffer.clear();
00238 
00239       m_line_buffer.add(line.c_str(), strlen(line.c_str())+1);
00240 
00241       base = (char *)m_line_buffer.base;
00242 
00246       if (m_leading_timestamps) {
00247         if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00248           cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00249           continue;
00250         }
00251         *ptr++ = 0;
00252         *timestampp = strtoll(base, &endptr, 10);
00253         if (*endptr != 0) {
00254           cerr << "error: invalid timestamp (" << base << ") on line "
00255                << m_cur_line << endl;
00256           continue;
00257         }
00258         base = ptr;
00259       }
00260       else
00261         *timestampp = 0;
00262 
00266       if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00267         cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00268         continue;
00269       }
00270       if (m_rsgen) {
00271         keyp->row_len = (ptr-base) + m_row_uniquify_chars + 1;
00272         m_row_key_buffer.clear();
00273         m_row_key_buffer.ensure(keyp->row_len + 1);
00274         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(base, ptr-base);
00275         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(" ", 1);
00276         m_rsgen->write((char *)m_row_key_buffer.ptr);
00277         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00278       }
00279       else {
00280         keyp->row = base;
00281         keyp->row_len = ptr - base;
00282       }
00283       *ptr++ = 0;
00284       base = ptr;
00285 
00289       if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00290         cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00291         continue;
00292       }
00293       *ptr = 0;
00294 
00295       if ((colon = strchr(base, ':')) != 0) {
00296         *colon++ = 0;
00297         keyp->column_family = base;
00298         if (colon < ptr) {
00299           keyp->column_qualifier = colon;
00300           keyp->column_qualifier_len = ptr - colon;
00301         }
00302         else {
00303           keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00304           keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00305         }
00306       }
00307       else {
00308         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00309         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00310       }
00311       keyp->column_family = base;
00312       ptr++;
00313 
00317       *valuep = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00318       *value_lenp = strlen(ptr);
00319 
00320       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00321         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00322         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00323         m_offset = new_offset;
00324       }
00325 
00326       return true;
00327     }
00328   }
00329   else {
00330     // skip timestamp and rowkey (if needed)
00331     while (m_next_value < m_limit &&
00332            should_skip(m_next_value, m_type_mask, m_dupkeycols))
00333       m_next_value++;
00334 
00335     // get from parsed cells if available
00336     if (m_next_value > 0 && m_next_value < m_limit) {
00337       keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00338       keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill();
00339       keyp->column_family = m_column_names[m_next_value].c_str();
00340       *timestampp = m_timestamp;
00341       // clear these, just in case they were set by the client
00342       if (keyp->column_qualifier || keyp->column_qualifier_len) {
00343         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00344         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00345       }
00346       if (m_values[m_next_value] == 0) {
00347         *valuep = 0;
00348         *value_lenp = 0;
00349       }
00350       else {
00351         *valuep = (uint8_t *)m_values[m_next_value];
00352         *value_lenp = strlen(m_values[m_next_value]);
00353       }
00354       m_next_value++;
00355 
00356       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00357         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00358         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00359         m_offset = new_offset;
00360       }
00361 
00362       return true;
00363     }
00364 
00365     while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00366       m_cur_line++;
00367       index = 0;
00368 
00369       if (consumedp && !m_zipped)
00370         *consumedp += line.length() + 1;
00371 
00372       boost::trim(line);
00373       if (line.length() == 0)
00374         continue;
00375 
00376       m_line_buffer.clear();
00377       m_line_buffer.add(line.c_str(), strlen(line.c_str())+1);
00378       m_values.clear();
00379 
00380       base = (char *)m_line_buffer.base;
00381 
00382       while ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) != 0) {
00383         *ptr++ = 0;
00384 
00385         if (strlen(base) == 0 || !strcmp(base, "NULL") ||
00386             !strcmp(base, "\\N")) {
00387           if (m_type_mask[index]) {
00388             cout << "WARNING: Required key or timestamp field not found "
00389                 "on line " << m_cur_line << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00390             continue;
00391           }
00392           m_values.push_back(0);
00393         }
00394         else
00395           m_values.push_back(base);
00396 
00397         base = ptr;
00398         index++;
00399       }
00400       if (strlen(base) == 0 || !strcmp(base, "NULL") || !strcmp(base, "\\N"))
00401         m_values.push_back(0);
00402       else
00403         m_values.push_back(base);
00404 
00405       m_limit = std::min(m_values.size(), m_column_names.size());
00406 
00410       m_row_key_buffer.clear();
00411       if (!add_row_component(0))
00412         continue;
00413 
00414       size_t i;
00415       for (i=1; i<m_key_comps.size(); i++) {
00416         m_row_key_buffer.add(" ", 1);
00417         if (!add_row_component(i))
00418           break;
00419       }
00420       if (i<m_key_comps.size())
00421         continue;       // rowkey not found. warning in add_row_component.
00422 
00423       m_row_key_buffer.ensure(1);
00424       *m_row_key_buffer.ptr = 0;
00425 
00426       if (m_timestamp_index >= 0) {
00427         struct tm tm;
00428         time_t t;
00429 
00430         if (m_values.size() <= (size_t)m_timestamp_index) {
00431           cerr << "warn: timestamp field not found on line " << m_cur_line
00432                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00433           continue;
00434         }
00435 
00436         if (!parse_date_format(m_values[m_timestamp_index], &tm)) {
00437           cerr << "warn: invalid timestamp format on line " << m_cur_line
00438                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00439           continue;
00440         }
00441 
00442         if ((t = timegm(&tm)) == (time_t)-1) {
00443           cerr << "warn: invalid timestamp format on line " << m_cur_line
00444                << ", skipping..." << endl;
00445           continue;
00446         }
00447 
00448         m_timestamp = (uint64_t)t * 1000000000LL;
00449       }
00450 
00451       m_next_value = 0;
00452       while (should_skip(m_next_value, m_type_mask, m_dupkeycols))
00453         m_next_value++;
00454 
00455       if (m_rsgen) {
00456         m_row_key_buffer.ensure(m_row_uniquify_chars + 2);
00457         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00458         keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill() + m_row_uniquify_chars + 1;
00459         m_row_key_buffer.add_unchecked(" ", 1);
00460         m_rsgen->write((char *)m_row_key_buffer.ptr);
00461         m_row_key_buffer.ptr += m_row_uniquify_chars;
00462       }
00463       else {
00464         keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00465         keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill();
00466       }
00467 
00468       keyp->column_family = m_column_names[m_next_value].c_str();
00469       *timestampp = m_timestamp;
00470       if (keyp->column_qualifier || keyp->column_qualifier_len) {
00471         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00472         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00473       }
00474       if (m_values[m_next_value] == 0) {
00475         *valuep = 0;
00476         *value_lenp = 0;
00477       }
00478       else {
00479         *valuep = (uint8_t *)m_values[m_next_value];
00480         *value_lenp = strlen(m_values[m_next_value]);
00481       }
00482       m_next_value++;
00483 
00484       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00485         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00486         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00487         m_offset = new_offset;
00488       }
00489 
00490       return true;
00491     }
00492 
00493   }
00494 
00495   return false;
00496 }

00500 bool LoadDataSource::add_row_component(int index) {
00501   const char *value = m_values[m_key_comps[index].index];
00502   size_t value_len = strlen(value);
00503 
00504   if ((size_t)m_key_comps[index].index >= m_values.size() || value == 0) {
00505     cout << "WARNING: Required key field not found on line " << m_cur_line
00506          << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00507     return false;
00508   }
00509 
00510   if ((size_t)m_key_comps[index].width > value_len) {
00511     size_t padding = m_key_comps[index].width - value_len;
00512     m_row_key_buffer.ensure(m_key_comps[index].width);
00513     if (m_key_comps[index].left_justify) {
00514       m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00515       memset(m_row_key_buffer.ptr, m_key_comps[index].pad_character, padding);
00516       m_row_key_buffer.ptr += padding;
00517     }
00518     else {
00519       memset(m_row_key_buffer.ptr, m_key_comps[index].pad_character, padding);
00520       m_row_key_buffer.ptr += padding;
00521       m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00522     }
00523   }
00524   else
00525     m_row_key_buffer.add(value, value_len);
00526 
00527   return true;
00528 
00529 }

00532 
00533 bool LoadDataSource::parse_date_format(const char *str, struct tm *tm) {
00534   int ival;
00535   const char *ptr = str;
00536   char *end_ptr;
00537 
00541   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 4 ||
00542       *end_ptr != '-')
00543     return false;
00544 
00545   tm->tm_year = ival - 1900;
00546   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00547 
00551   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 2 ||
00552       *end_ptr != '-')
00553     return false;
00554 
00555   tm->tm_mon = ival - 1;
00556   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00557 
00561   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 2 ||
00562       *end_ptr != ' ')
00563     return false;
00564 
00565   tm->tm_mday = ival;
00566   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00567 
00571   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00572   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ':')
00573     return false;
00574   tm->tm_hour = ival;
00575 
00576   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00577 
00581   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00582   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ':')
00583     return false;
00584   tm->tm_min = ival;
00585 
00586   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00587 
00591   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00592   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2)
00593     return false;
00594   tm->tm_sec = ival;
00595 
00596   tm->tm_gmtoff = 0;
00597   tm->tm_zone = "GMT";
00598 
00599   return true;
00600 }
